info.name: Infrastructure
info.description:
Complete API collection for Infrastructure application including SuperAdmin signup, organization management, location management, roles & permissions management, user management, and project management.

🔧 WORKFLOW FIXES APPLIED:
- Fixed database permissions for app_user to access iam/project schemas
- Fixed project_phase constraint violation (changed 'planning' to 'pre_construction')
- Updated all date examples to use future dates
- Added JWT token validation in Sign In tests
- Verified complete signup workflow: SignUp → Confirm → SignIn → API Access

✅ ENHANCED JWT TOKEN SYSTEM:
1. SuperAdmin Signup: Creates Cognito user with custom:isSuperAdmin=true
2. Normal User Creation: Super admins create users via POST /users with Cognito integration
3. Email Confirmation: Triggers PostConfirmation Lambda → Creates user in IAM database
4. Sign In: PreTokenGeneration Lambda → Adds enriched JWT with:
   - User profile (user_id, org_id, email, names)
   - Location access (last_selected_location_id)
   - All locations & roles (base64 encoded for offline access)
   - Organization details and admin flags
5. Offline Authorization: Frontend can check permissions without API calls
6. UI Integration: Location dropdown populated from JWT, no additional API needed

🚀 CONSTRUCTION MANAGEMENT OPTIMIZED:
- Mobile-first design for field workers
- Offline-capable role-based authorization
- Hierarchical access control (org → location → project)
- Password reset workflow for normal users

📧 USER MANAGEMENT ENHANCEMENTS:
- Flexible user updates: PUT /users/{id} supports partial updates including email changes
- Email synchronization: Email updates automatically sync with AWS Cognito
- Automatic user activation: Users with 'pending' status are automatically activated on first successful login
- Single update endpoint: All user field updates (profile, email, status) use one unified API

exec: console.log('SuperAdmin signup completed. Check email for confirmation code.');
console.log('WORKFLOW: 1. SignUp -> 2. Confirm -> 3. SignIn -> 4. Use APIs');
console.log('NOTE: PostConfirmation trigger creates user in IAM database');
console.log('NOTE: PreTokenGeneration adds user_id, org_id to JWT tokens');
console.log('Email confirmation completed. User can now sign in.');
console.log('Tokens stored in globals for API calls');
// Decode and verify ID token has custom claims
console.log('Failed to decode JWT token:', e);
console.log('SuperAdmin sign in successful with custom claims!');

{
  "title": "Updated: Concrete crack in slab at Grid B-4",
  "description": "Hairline crack observed in concrete slab extending approximately 3 feet. Crack width has been measured at 0.08 inches. Located near column intersection at Grid B-4. Additional photos taken for documentation.",
  "priority": "critical",
  "severity": "major",
  "root_cause": "Confirmed: Improper curing process during concrete placement combined with rapid temperature change",
  "location": {
    "description": "Level 3 slab near column intersection - crack extends north-south",
    "coordinates": {
      "x": 450.5,
      "y": 320.2
    },
    "building": "Tower A",
    "level": "Level 3",
    "room": "Open Area Zone B"
  },
  "discipline": "structural",

  "status": "in_progress",
  "distribution_list": [
    "pm@contractor.com",
    "super@site.com",
    "qa@owner.com",
    "structural.engineer@consultant.com"
  ]
}
